articles.author: Michael Doran
articles.title: Thai Airways Bounces Back To Profit And Sells Six Boeing 777s - Simple Flying
articles.description: Thai Airways is the latest Asian airline to announce first-quarter profits as it recovers under the Group's rehabilitation plan.
articles.content: Another sign of how well Asian airlines are recovering came on Friday when Thai Airways announced a return to profit in the first three months of 2023 (1Q2023). The profit came off the back of increa… [+3436 chars]
